body_html:
As the documentation says, the Android NNAPI is only available for version 8.1 and above.
https://www.tensorflow.org/mobile/tflite/

TF Lite does not appear to support any other Android acceleration framework. Some people report some success adapting TF to use renderscript, e.g.
https://github.com/EE202B/RenderScriptOps

body:
As the documentation says, the Android NNAPI is only available for version 8.1 and above. 
https://www.tensorflow.org/mobile/tflite/

TF Lite does not appear to support any other Android acceleration framework.  Some people report some success adapting TF to use renderscript, e.g.
https://github.com/EE202B/RenderScriptOps
